content.text:
# Edward Brown Glass

Edward Brown Glass  was an  Anglican priest: the Archdeacon of Man from 1964 until 1978.
Born on 1 July 1913, he was educated at King Williams College on the island and Durham University and ordained in 1938.  After curacies in Rochdale and Gorton he held incumbencies at Heywood, Ramsey and Castletown before his Archdeaconâ€™s appointment.
He died on 2 June 1995.
